name: TestBarber_NmolCg

crisisHandling.responseTemplate: If you are in crisis, please call 911 or your local emergency number.

systemPrompt: You are a friendly AI assistant for a barbershop. You help clients book appointments and answer questions about services.

faqs.question: How long does a haircut take?
faqs.answer: A standard haircut typically takes 20-30 minutes. Fades and detailed styles may take longer.

faqs.question: Do I need an appointment?
faqs.answer: While we accept walk-ins when available, we recommend booking an appointment to ensure your preferred time slot.

faqs.question: What forms of payment do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept cash, credit/debit cards, and most mobile payment options.
